testcase.classname: Facility Maintenance and Renovation Policy Form - LEED v4.1 O+M: EB
testcase.name: Filling Facility Maintenance and Renovation Policy
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on project O+M:EB positiveFlow............................passed And User navigates to the credits page of the project.......................passed And User should be on form Facility Maintenance and Renovation Policy.......passed And User verifies form version,credit name matches in scorecard and form page.passed And User uploads files to Add file button...................................passed And User verifies the uploaded files........................................passed And User Enters data to Narrative field and verifies........................passed And User clicks on Save button..............................................passed Then User can able to see the form got saved................................passed And User verifies the revision icon present after saving the form...........passed And User dowloads the generated pdf form....................................passed And User verifies the narrative from pdf and form page......................passed And User verifies the uploaded files from pdf and form page.................passed And User clicks the Complete icon to set status to Ready for Review.........passed And User clicks on cancel while deleting the uploaded file and verifies the files are retained.passed And User deletes the uploaded files and verifies the files are deleted......passed
